title: Conduct Occupational Noise Survey
description: An occupational hygienist conducts a noise survey in the processing plant to ensure workers are not exposed to harmful noise levels.

tasks.description: Identify the areas and roles to be included in the noise survey, focusing on high-risk areas like the grinding mills.
Use a dosimeter to measure the personal noise exposure of a mill operator over their full shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: A full-shift noise dose measurement is collected.

tasks.description: Compare the measured noise dose to the regulated occupational exposure limit. If it exceeds the limit, recommend additional controls (e.g., better hearing protection).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis confirms the exposure is within limits, but recommends new noise-dampening enclosures as a proactive measure.
